title: Unlimit enters stablecoin infrastructure race with decentralized clearing house
contentSnippet: The new platform lands amid a wave of fintech adoption of stablecoins for global transfers, payouts and onchain settlement.

title: The BIG Crypto Fake-Out! Saylor & Tether FUD! Vanguard Crypto ETFs!

title: Bank of America Endorses Up to 4% Allocation of Wealth Management Portfolios to Crypto: Report
contentSnippet: The bank joined a growing list of traditional finance firms that have increased their embrace of digital asset investment strategies.

title: Trump-Associated American Bitcoin Plunges 40% on Heavy Volume, Dragging Hut 8 Lower by 12%
contentSnippet: The collapse marks yet another disappointing Trump family crypto-related investment.

title: Bitcoin Volatility Breaks Out Vs VIX, Setting Up Possible Pair Trade Opportunity
contentSnippet: The spread between BTC and S&P 500 implied volatility indices is widening again.

title: AI Investment to Drive Global Growth Through 2026, BofA Says
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners have been among those riding the AI boom, with IREN and Cipher Mining up over 300% in 2025.

title: Why Coinbase Shares Still Have 90% Upside Despite Crypto Pullback, According to Wall Street Analyst
contentSnippet: Bernstein kept its Street-high $510 price target on Coinbase, citing strong fundamentals and product expansion.

title: Brazil Sentences 14 for Using Crypto, Shell Firms in $95M Drug Money Laundering Case
contentSnippet: The defendants were found to have used fake companies and cryptocurrency transactions to conceal the origin of the illicit funds.

title: Polkadot Surges 13% After Breaking Above Key Resistance
contentSnippet: The token outpaced broader crypto markets as volume spiked 34% above weekly averages.

title: Iren Plans to Sell Up to $2.3 Billion of Convertible Notes, Shares Drop
contentSnippet: The company also plans to sell shares to fund the repurchase of existing debt.

title: A simple breakdown of Strategy’s Bitcoin plan and what could shape future sales
contentSnippet: A clear look at Strategy’s Bitcoin model, the conditions that could trigger sales and how to understand future updates within the proper context.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP Spike a Day After Mass Sell-off
contentSnippet: Bitcoin surges past $90,000 in biggest rally since May as crypto markets rebound with strong ETF inflows.

title: American Bitcoin stock tumbles 50% as BTC proxy trade unravels
contentSnippet: ABTC shares plunged by more than 50% in early trading as the broader crypto market downturn triggered a sharp repricing of mining and treasury stocks.

title: Atkins says SEC has 'enough authority' to drive crypto rules forward in 2026
contentSnippet: Paul Atkins spoke from the NYSE on Tuesday, saying that the SEC planned to unveil an innovation exemption for crypto projects ”in a month or so.”

contentSnippet: Crypto majors are green and reversing yesterday’s selloff, with BTC up 2% at $87,400, ETH flat at $2,820, BNB up 2% at $842, and SOL up 2% at $129. Among top movers, Fartcoin (+14%), SPX (+12%), and P

title: SOL Bulls Take a Breather After Pumping Millions Into ETFs
contentSnippet: Solana exchange-traded funds debuted on Oct. 28 and performed flawlessly with inflows 21 consecutive days until the day before Thanksgiving.

title: Why Texas’ Bitcoin reserve move signals a shift in government crypto policy
contentSnippet: Texas’ Bitcoin reserve initiative under SB 21 signals a shift in how governments may approach digital assets and how it could influence the financial system at a macro level.

title: Kraken Agrees to Buy Tokenization Specialist Backed Finance as RWA Trend Accelerates
contentSnippet: The exchange has already teamed up with the Switzerland-based firm for its tokenized equity offering, xStocks.

title: Bitcoin Surges Back Above $91K as Support Builds in $80K-$85K Area
contentSnippet: Helping the mood in crypto were moves by institutional giants Vanguard and Bank of America to open up digital assets to their clients.

title: White-Collar Fraudster Jailed in UK After Converting $650K in Company Funds to Crypto
contentSnippet: Experts suggest that crypto-related white-collar crime could be on the rise, with many firms unprepared for a growth in such crime.

title: Ethereum price analysis: Will ETH continue to decline in December?
contentSnippet: Ethereum risks a deeper sell-off toward $2,500–$2,200 as MVRV support weakens and a bearish pennant threatens to break lower.

title: Identity checks to power AI stablecoin payments added to Coinbase-incubated x402
contentSnippet: Concordium has added ID checks to stablecoin payments, enabling AI systems to purchase restricted goods and services online.

title: Sanctioned Lender Huione Shuts Phnom Penh Branches, Halts Withdrawals
contentSnippet: The Cambodian finance giant has closed its doors amid mounting international pressure including U.S. and UK sanctions.

title: XRP ETF inflows exceed $756M as bullish divergence hints at trend reversal
contentSnippet: Spot XRP ETFs recorded inflows for 11 consecutive days as the RSI formed a bullish divergence on the price charts, early signs that a rally was in the cards.

title: Russia mulls relaxing crypto rules to blunt impact of Western sanctions
contentSnippet: Russia’s central bank is considering scrapping its strict requirements for crypto transactions as sanctions make it hard for Russians to transact internationally.

title: PlayStation Goes Crypto? Sony Stablecoin Could Be Used for Gaming Payments: Nikkei
contentSnippet: Sony Group plans for U.S. customers to pay for video game subscriptions and other content using its own stablecoin.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Morning Minute: Vanguard Finally Lets Investors Buy Crypto
contentSnippet: It's a major reversal from one of the longest standing anti-crypto giants, and a major signal that crypto is now mainstream.

title: Privacy Coins Lose Steam as ZCash, Monero, and Dash Follow Crypto Market Pullback
contentSnippet: Privacy coins like ZCash and Monero dropped as analysts say the "safe haven" narrative has broken, tying their fate to Bitcoin's cycles.

title: Myriad Partners With Trust Wallet to Launch First In-Wallet Prediction Markets
contentSnippet: Trust Wallet’s self-custody Web3 wallet is the first to natively integrate prediction markets in a “single, streamlined experience.”

title: AIがスマートコントラクト脆弱性6億9000万円分を発見　防御活用にも期待＝レポート
contentSnippet: Anthropicの研究で、AIエージェントがスマートコントラクト脆弱性6億9000万円分を発見。2025年3月以降の34件で460万ドル相当の攻撃に成功し、新たに2件のゼロデイ脆弱性も発見。攻撃収益は1.3カ月ごとに倍増しており、防御活用が急務に。

title: FRBが3年半にわたる量的引き締め（QT）終了、仮想通貨市場に流動性改善の可能性
contentSnippet: 米FRBが12月1日、3年半にわたる量的引き締め(QT)を終了した。約2.4兆ドル規模の資産縮小後、仮想通貨市場への流動性改善が期待される。2019年QT終了時はビットコインが短期下落後に上昇した経緯があるが、専門家は政策効果の遅延やインフレ動向など不確実性に慎重な見方も示している。

title: 走行映像でGARコインを還元　ドラレコアプリ「セトラス」が地方創生DXモデルを始動
contentSnippet: セトラスが市民のドラレコ映像を行政業務に活用し、専用暗号通貨「GARコイン」で報酬を還元する地方創生モデルを発表。実証実験に参加する自治体を3枠限定で募集している。

title: コインベースへの情報開示請求が過去最多の1.2万件、欧米で協力要請急増　実態判明
contentSnippet: コインベースが2025年透明性レポートを公開し、60カ国以上から12,716件の情報開示請求を受領し、前年比19%増加となったと報告した。米国の件数がトップだが、米国外からの請求は53%を占め前年比2%増加した。

title: 米FDIC、ステーブルコイン規制「ジーニアス法」運用規則案を12月下旬に公表予定
contentSnippet: 米FDIC代行議長がステーブルコイン規制「ジーニアス法」の運用規則案を今月に公表する予定だと表明。トークン化預金や仮想通貨業界のデバンキング問題についても対処を説明した。

title: カルシ、ソラナ上で予測市場トークン化を開始　仮想通貨の流動性取り込みへ
contentSnippet: 米予測市場カルシがソラナ上で予測市場契約のトークン化を開始。オンチェーン取引により匿名性が向上し、開発者のサードパーティ構築も可能に。評価額110億ドル、約3500市場を運営する同社は仮想通貨ユーザーの流動性獲得を目指す。

title: 米トランプ政権の仮想通貨特命官サックス氏、利益相反報道を否定
contentSnippet: 米トランプ政権のAI・仮想通貨特命官デビッド・サックス氏がNYタイムズの利益相反報道を否定した。名誉毀損専門の法律事務所に対応を依頼し、倫理規定遵守を主張している。

title: ゴールドマンがイノベーター買収、ビットコイン連動ETFも取得で仮想通貨事業拡大
contentSnippet: ゴールドマン・サックスがETF大手イノベーターを20億ドルで買収すると発表した。買収にはビットコイン連動ファンドQBFも含まれ、ゴールドマンの仮想通貨関連商品ラインアップが拡大。

title: リップル、シンガポールでライセンス範囲拡大　XRPとRLUSDによる決済事業を強化
contentSnippet: リップルがシンガポール金融管理局から主要決済機関ライセンスの拡大承認を取得。XRPとRLUSDを活用した決済サービスを強化。アジア太平洋地域のオンチェーン活動は前年比70%増で、同地域での事業拡大を加速。

title: ビットコイン100万円幅急落、yETH流出事故で大規模清算｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: ビットコインは軟調な推移が続いている。1日には一時8万5,000ドルを割り込み、日本円ベースでも24時間比で100万円超の下落となった。背景には、イーサリアムが「フサカ・アップデート」を目前に控えロングポジションが積み上がる一方、Yearn FinanceでyETHの流出事故が発生し、ロングポジションの清算が連鎖したことがある。
